## collect() function

Create an array populated by the results of a given number of calls to a given creator function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function collect<T>(numElems: number, creatorCallback: (ix: number) => T): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  numElems | number | number of elements to populate the array with. |
|  creatorCallback | (ix: number) =&gt; T | a function to call |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]

new array of collected generated elements
